## Stanek.acceptGift() method

Accept Stanek's Gift by joining the Church of the Machine God

**Signature:**

```typescript
acceptGift(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the player is a member of the church and has the gift installed, false otherwise.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 2 GB
